label: Circuit
description: The code of the federal judicial circuit where the case was located
parent_category: Appeals Integrated Database; Bankruptcy Petition Newstats Snapshots Database; Civil Integrated Database; Criminal Integrated Database

label: Nature of original proceeding
description: Nature of the original proceeding

label: In forma pauperis
description: Indicates if appeal proceeded in forma pauperis

label: Divisional office
description: The code of the circuit office where the case was located

label: Administrative agency
description: The code of the U.S. government agency involved

label: Jurisdiction
description: Basis of jurisdiction for civil appeals
parent_category: Appeals Integrated Database; Civil Integrated Database

label: Nature of suit
description: Nature of suit for civil appeals
parent_category: Appeals Integrated Database; Civil Integrated Database

label: Nature of offense
description: Nature of offense for criminal appeals

label: Other type
description: Additional information regarding bankruptcy or other appeals

label: District court Circuit
description: The code of the federal judicial circuit in which the case was originally filed

label: District court District
description: The code of the federal judicial district/bankruptcy court in which the case was originally filed

label: Docket number
description: Docket number assigned by the circuit to the case
parent_category: Appeals Integrated Database; Bankruptcy Petition Newstats Snapshots Database; Civil Integrated Database; Criminal Integrated Database

label: District court Office
description: The code of the district/bankruptcy office in which the case was originally filed

label: District court Docket
description: Docket number assigned to the case in the district/bankruptcy court

label: District court Docket date
description: Date the case was docketed in the district/bankruptcy court

label: Notice of appeal date
description: Date the notice of appeal was filed in the lower court

label: AOUSC filing month
description: Month the case was entered on the appeals statistical file of the AOUSC

label: AOUSC filing year
description: Year the case was entered on the appeals statistical file of the AOUSC

label: Outcome
description: Type of disposition action for merit terminations

label: Procedural termination
description: Type of disposition action for procedural terminations after other judicial action

label: Method of disposition
description: Type of disposition action for procedural terminations without judicial action

label: Reopen
description: Denotes reopened/remanded appeal

label: Opinion/order
description: Opinion or order prepared by court to dispose of appeal

label: Determination of original proceeding
description: Determination of original proceeding outcome

label: Joined appeal
description: Type of joined appeal

label: Joined appeal docket number
description: Docket number of joined appeal

label: Complete record date
description: Date the original briefing notice or schedule was issued by the court of appeals

label: Last brief filing date
description: Date last brief was filed

label: Submission date
description: Date appeal was submitted on the merits

label: Oral hearing date
description: Date appeal was orally argued on the merits before a panel of the court

label: Final judgment date
description: Date final judgment, decree, or order was entered to announce decision of court

label: Opinion
description: Opinion

label: Docket date
description: Date the case was docketed in the court of appeals

label: Judge code 1
description: First judge

label: Judge code 2
description: Second judge

label: Judge code 3
description: Third judge

label: Tape year
description: Statistical year ID label on data file obtained from the AOUSC which represents termination year
parent_category: Appeals Integrated Database; Criminal Integrated Database

label: Pro se at filing
description: Identifies pro se parties of time of filing

label: Pro se at termination
description: Identifies pro se parties of time of termination

label: Status code
description: Status of the case

label: AOUSC termination month
description: Month the case was terminated on the appeals statistical file of the AOUSC

label: AOUSC termination year
description: Year the case was terminated on the appeals statistical file of the AOUSC

label: Certificate of probable cause decision
description: Status of petition for Certificate of Probable Cause

label: US appellant
description: Indicates whether or not the United States initiated the appeal

label: Certificate of probable cause decision made by
description: Indicates which court made the decision regarding the petition for Certificate of Probable Cause

label: Full judge panel
description: Indicates whether a single judge or full panel heard the case

label: Counsel appointed
description: Indicates if counsel was appointed by court

label: Counsel continued
description: Indicates if counsel was continued from district court

label: Counsel source District
description: Source of counsel in district court

label: Counsel source Circuit
description: Source of counsel in circuit court

label: Statistical year
description: AOUSC statistical year in which the appeal was terminated

label: Appellant name
description: Name of the party initiating the appeal

label: US appellee
description: Indicates whether or not the appeal was filed against the United States

label: Appellee name
description: Name of the party against whom the appeal was taken

label: Type of appeal
description: Type of appeal at filing

label: Disposition
description: Type of disposition action taken by court to terminate appeal
parent_category: Appeals Integrated Database; Civil Integrated Database

label: Snapshot period
description: Snapshot ending date. September 30 of the snapshot year

label: Origin
description: Code indicating whether the case originated from an inter-district or intra-district transfer or was split from another case
parent_category: Bankruptcy Petition Newstats Snapshots Database; Civil Integrated Database

label: Original filing date
description: Date on which the original case was filed for a case that has been split, transferred, or reopened

label: Filing date
description: Date petition filed for an original case, or date of split, transfer, or reopen
parent_category: Bankruptcy Petition Newstats Snapshots Database; Civil Integrated Database; Criminal Integrated Database

label: Filing calendar year
description: Calendar year of the filing date

label: Filing fiscal year
description: Fiscal year of the filing date

label: Original filing chapter
description: Chapter of the Bankruptcy Code as reported on the first record submitted to the AOUSC (i.e., the best representation of the chapter under which the case was originally filed)

label: Original filing Subchapter V
description: Code indicating a Chapter 11 Subchapter V small business debtor reorganization case as reported on the first record submitted to the AOUSC (i.e., the best representation of the subchapter under which the case was originally filed)

label: Current chapter
description: Chapter of the Bankruptcy Code as reported on the most current record received by the AOUSC as of the end of the snapshot period (i.e., the best representation of the chapter under which the case is currently being administered)

label: Current Subchapter V
description: Code indicating a Chapter 11 Subchapter V small business debtor reorganization case as reported on the most current record received by the AOUSC as of the end of the snapshot period (i.e., the best representation of the subchapter under which the case is currently being administered)

label: Original nature of debt
description: Distinguishes whether debtor's debts are primarily consumer or business debts as reported on the first record submitted to the AOUSC

label: Filing indicator
description: Indicates whether the case was filed during the snapshot period

label: Nature of debt
description: Distinguishes whether debtor's debts are primarily consumer or business debts as reported on the most current record received by the AOUSC as of the end of the snapshot period

label: Joint flag
description: Flag indicating if this is an individual or joint petition

label: Debtor1 zip
description: Zip code for street address of first listed debtor

label: Debtor1 county
description: The five digit FIPS code for the county of residence of the first listed debtor

label: Original debtor1 filing prose
description: Code indicating whether the first listed debtor is currently represented by an attorney as reported on the first record submitted to the AOUSC

label: Debtor1 filing prose
description: Code indicating whether the first listed debtor is currently represented by an attorney as reported on the most current record received by the AOUSC as of the end of the snapshot period

label: Debtor1 date prose change
description: Date of most recent change to filing prose status for first listed debtor

label: Debtor2 zip
description: Zip code for street address of second listed debtor

label: Debtor2 county
description: The five digit FIPS code for the county of residence of the second listed debtor

label: Original debtor2 filing prose
description: Code indicating whether the second listed debtor is currently represented by an attorney as reported on the first record submitted to the AOUSC

label: Pending indicator
description: Indicates whether the case was pending as of the last day of the snapshot period

label: Debtor2 filing prose
description: Code indicating whether the second listed debtor is currently represented by an attorney as reported on the most current record received by the AOUSC as of the end of the snapshot period

label: Debtor2 date prose change
description: Date of most recent change to filing prose status for second listed debtor

label: Original fee status
description: Status of payment of the filing fee as reported on the first record submitted to the AOUSC

label: Fee status
description: Status of payment of the filing fee as reported on the most current record received by the AOUSC as of the end of the snapshot period

label: Type case
description: Distinguishes voluntary from involuntary petitions

label: Original type debtor
description: Legal form of the debtor as reported on the first record submitted to the AOUSC

label: Type debtor
description: Legal form of the debtor

label: Nature of business
description: Provided additional information on the nature of business for business bankruptcies (e.g., Stockbroker, Health Care Business, Non-Profit Organization)

label: Prior filing
description: Code indicating whether the debtor(s) filed a bankruptcy case at any time in the previous 8 years

label: Original estimated assets
description: Code providing an estimate in ranges of total assets at filing as reported on the first record submitted to the AOUSC

label: Closing indicator
description: Indicates whether the case was closed during the snapshot period

label: Estimated assets
description: Code providing an estimate in ranges of total assets at filing as reported on the most current record received by the AOUSC as of the end of the snapshot period

label: Original estimated liabilities
description: Code providing an estimate in ranges of total liabilities at filing as reported on the first record submitted to the AOUSC

label: Estimated liabilities
description: Code providing an estimate in ranges of total liabilities at filing as reported on the most current record received by the AOUSC as of the end of the snapshot period

label: Original estimated creditors
description: Code providing an estimate in ranges of the number of creditors at filing as reported on the first record submitted to the AOUSC

label: Estimated creditors
description: Code providing an estimate in ranges of the number of creditors at filing as reported on the most current record received by the AOUSC as of the end of the snapshot period

label: Original asset case
description: Code indicating whether there will be funds available for distribution to unsecured creditors as reported on the first record submitted to the AOUSC

label: Asset case
description: Code indicating whether there will be funds available for distribution to unsecured creditors as reported on the most current record received by the AOUSC as of the end of the snapshot period

label: Small business debtor
description: Identifies if the debtor is a small business debtor in Chapter 11 cases

label: Prepackaged case
description: Provides information regarding if a plan was filed with a petition in Chapter 11 cases

label: Total assets
description: Value reflects the amount of the debtor's total assets and is the sum of the debtor's real property from Schedule A and the debtor's personal property from Schedule B, as reported on Form B6 Summary of Schedules at filing

label: Case key
description: Unique 16-character identifier for each case consisting of the prefix 'BK' followed by the Circuit code, District code, Office code, Docket Number, Generation, and Sequence.

label: Real property
description: Value reflects the sum of the debtor's real property from Schedule A, as reported on Form B6 Summary of Schedules at filing

label: Personal property
description: Value reflects the sum of the debtor's personal property from Schedule B, as reported on Form B6 Summary of Schedules at filing

label: Total liabilities
description: Value reflects the amount of the debtor's total liabilities at filing; sum of the secured claims from Schedule D, the unsecured priority claims from Schedule E, and the unsecured nonpriority claims from Schedule F, as reported on Form B6 Summary of Schedules

label: Secured claims
description: Value reflects the sum of the secured claims from Schedule D, as reported on Form B6 Summary of Schedules at filing

label: Unsecured priority claims
description: Value reflects the sum of unsecured priority claims from Schedule E, as reported on Form B6 Summary of Schedules at filing

label: Unsecured nonpriority claims
description: Value reflects the sum of the unsecured nonpriority claims from Schedule F. as reported on Form B6 Summary of Schedules at filing

label: Total debt discharged
description: This is the amount of the total debt that presumptively will be discharged, and is calculated by subtracting 'Non Dischargeable Debt' from the sum of 'Secured Claims', 'Unsecured Priority Claims', and 'Unsecured NonPriority Claims'

label: Non dischargeable debt
description: This field reports debt from Schedules E and F that is predominantly non-dischargeable, and is the total of certain amounts reported on the Statistical Summary of Certain Liabilities and Related Data at filing; see full description

label: Total debt
description: This is the sum of 'Total Debt Discharged' and 'Non Dischargeable Debt'

label: Current monthly income
description: Current monthly income is from Line 12 of form 22A for chapter 7 debtors, Line 11 of form 22B for Chapter 11 debtors, and Line 20 of form 22C for chapter 13 debtors, as reported on the Statistical Summary of Certain Liabilities and Related Data at filing

label: District
description: Code of the federal judicial district in which the case is located
parent_category: Bankruptcy Petition Newstats Snapshots Database; Civil Integrated Database; Criminal Integrated Database

label: Average monthly income
description: Average Monthly Income from Line 16 of Schedule I, as reported on the Statistical Summary of Certain Liabilities and Related Data at filing

label: Average monthly expenses
description: Average Monthly Income from Line 18 of Schedule J, as reported on the Statistical Summary of Certain Liabilities and Related Data at filing

label: Source case number
description: For transferred cases, the source case number on the case record in the transferee office/district contains unique identifying information about the case from which the transfer occurred; when a case has been split from its original case, the source case number on the case record for the resulting case contains unique identifying information about the case from which the split occurred

label: Destination case number
description: When a case is transferred, the destination case number on the case record in the transferor office/district contains unique identifying information about the case in the transferee district; when a case has been split from its original case, the destination case number on the original case record contains unique identifying information about the case that was split off

label: Consolidated lead case number
description: For consolidated cases: reflects unique identifying information for the lead case

label: Jointly administered case number
description: For jointly administered cases: reflects unique identifying information for the lead case

label: Filing CMECF version
description: Version of CM/ECF the court was using at the time the case record containing the filing data was transmitted to AOUSC, which may or may not reflect the version of CM/ECF in place when the case was filed

label: Closing date
description: Date case was considered 'closed' for statistical purposes

label: Closing calendar year
description: Calendar year case was considered 'closed' for statistical purposes

label: Closing fiscal year
description: Fiscal year case was considered 'closed' for statistical purposes

label: Office
description: Code of the district office in which the case is located
parent_category: Bankruptcy Petition Newstats Snapshots Database; Civil Integrated Database; Criminal Integrated Database

label: Closing chapter
description: Chapter of the Bankruptcy Code under which the case closed in the bankruptcy court

label: Closing Subchapter V
description: Code indicating a case was closed as a Chapter 11 Subchapter V small business debtor reorganization case

label: Debtor1 closing prose
description: Code indicating whether the first listed debtor was represented by an attorney at the time case closed

label: Debtor1 final disposition
description: Code indicating the manner in which the case was disposed for the first listed debtor

label: Debtor1 final disposition date
description: Date of the final disposition for the first listed debtor

label: Debtor1 final disposition calendar year
description: Calendar year of the final disposition for the first listed debtor

label: Debtor1 final disposition fiscal year
description: Fiscal year of the final disposition for the first listed debtor

label: Debtor2 closing prose
description: Code indicating whether the second listed debtor was represented by an attorney at the time case closed

label: Debtor2 final disposition
description: Code indicating the manner in which the case was disposed for the second listed debtor

label: Debtor2 final disposition date
description: Date of the final disposition for the second listed debtor

label: Generation
description: Indicates whether the case is an original or reopened case

label: Debtor2 final disposition calendar year
description: Calendar year of the final disposition for the second listed debtor

label: Debtor2 final disposition fiscal year
description: Fiscal year of the final disposition for the second listed debtor

label: Chapter 11 percent dividend
description: Percent dividend to be paid under the plan for Chapter 11 cases

label: Chapter 11 future payments
description: Indicates future payments are expected but the percentage is not determinable for Chapter 11 cases only

label: Closing CMECF version
description: Version of CM/ECF the court was using at the time the record containing the case closing data was transmitted to the AOUSC, which may or may not reflect the version of CM/ECF in place when the case was closed.

label: Tax exempt
description: Indicates whether a business is a tax exempt organization

label: Sequence
description: Code indicating whether the case is an original filing or a first or subsequent reopening

label: Record quality indicator
description: This field is used to quantify the accuracy of the record. The evaluation programming has not yet been implemented; therefore this field is always blank.

label: Termination date
description: The date the case was closed in district court. This is the date of the final judgment or of the order disposing of the action. If the case was transferred, the date of transfer is the termination date.
parent_category: Appeals Integrated Database; Civil Integrated Database; Criminal Integrated Database

label: Filing date used by AO
description: The statistical date when the filing entered the master AO record. The date used by the AO to assign the case to a 'statistical year filed' cohort.

label: Termination magistrate
description: Blank on public use files

label: Procedural progress
description: Procedural progress at termination

label: Nature of judgment
description: The nature of the judgment for those actions disposed of by the entry of a final judgment

label: Amount received
description: The monetary judgment amount awarded (excluding costs) in thousands of dollars. (Value associated with nature of judgment codes 1 and 2.)

label: Judgment for
description: Identifies the party favored by the judgment of the court for actions disposed of by the entry of a final judgment.

label: Magistrate involvement
description: Level of involvement of the U.S. magistrate

label: Other Involvement
description: Involvement in the case of persons other than judge or magistrate

label: Termination date used by AO
description: The statistical date when the termination entered the AO master record. The date used by the AO to assign the case to a 'statistical year terminated' cohort.

label: Residence
description: Describes the citizenship of the principal parties in cases in which diversity of citizenship is the basis of federal jurisdiction (JURISDICTION value of 4). The two-digit code is a composite of a single-digit plaintiff's code and a single-digit defendant's code (that is, a 1 for plaintiff and a 3 for defendant yields a residence code of 13).

label: Class action
description: Class Action allegation under Rule 23, Federal Rules of Civil Procedure.

label: Filing judge
description: Blank on public use files

label: Trial date
description: Year and month that trial commenced

label: Demand
description: Amount demanded in thousands of dollars.

label: Filing magistrate
description: Blank on public use files

label: County
description: Code for the county of residence of the first-listed plaintiff, except where the United States is the plaintiff; in that case it is the code of the county of residence for the first-listed defendant. In land condemnation cases, the county code of the land in question is used.

label: Style (parties involved)
description: Format: Plaintiff (et.al.) v. Defendant (et.al.)

label: Defendant number
description: A unique number assigned to each defendant in a case

label: Interval
description: The number of months from filing date to termination date

label: Termination offense code
description: The four digit offense code representing the most severe offense at termination

label: Major offense description
description: The code indicating the nature or type of disposition of the most severe offense

label: Counsel
description: A code indicating the type of legal cousel assigned to a defendant

label: Termination judge
description: The statistical code associated with the judge who terminated the case
parent_category: Criminal Integrated Database; Civil Integrated Database

label: Observation code
description: Code indicating the title and section of the U.S. Code applicable to the offense committed which carried the highest severity

label: Sentence category
description: Code indicating the nature of the defendant's sentence

label: Statute
description: Code indicating the title and section of the U.S. Code applicable to the offense under which the defendant was disposed

label: Sentence type
description: Code indicating the length of the defendant's sentence

label: Prison term
description: The number of months a defendant was sentenced to prison

label: Proceeding code
description: A code used to identify the nature of the proceeding

label: Probation term
description: The number of months a defendants was sentenced to probation

label: Fine
description: The fine imposed upon the defendant at sentencing

label: Sex
description: Sex of the defendant

label: Race
description: Race of the defendant

label: Birth year
description: Year of birth of the defendant

label: Marital status
description: Marital status of the defendant

label: Education
description: Highest level of education attained by the defendant

label: Prior record
description: Code ranking the severity of a defendant's prior record

label: Presentence investigation
description: Type of presentence investigation

label: Rule 20 transfer
description: Type of Rule 20/21 Transfer under which the case was transferred

label: Filing offense code
description: The four digit offense code representing the most severe offense at filing

label: Defendant name
description: The defendant's name as reported on the indictment, information, or other charging documents

label: Filing offense level
description: A code indicating the level of offense associated with the most severe offense at filing

label: Termination offense level
description: A code indicating the level of offense associated with the most severe offense at termination

label: Duplicate defendant
description: Indicates if the record is the second record for a defendant in the same district within a statistical year

label: Transfer docket number
description: The docket number originally assigned by the district from which a transfer took place

label: Transfer defendant number
description: The unique number originally assigned to a defendant by the district from which a transfer took place

label: Transfer circuit
description: The code of the judicial circuit from which a transfer took place

label: Transfer district
description: The code of the judicial district from which a transfer took place

label: Transfer office
description: The code of the district office from which a transfer took place
